net.sitecore.android.sdk.api
Interface ScApiSession

public interface ScApiSession

Interface for interaction with Sitecore Item Web API. All requests to Sitecore Item Web API are built using instances of ScApiSession.

Method Summary

createItem

RequestBuilder createItem(java.lang.String itemName,
                          java.lang.String template,
                          Response.Listener<ItemsResponse> successListener,
                          Response.ErrorListener errorListener)
Creates RequestBuilder to build the CreateItemRequest

Parameters:
itemName - specifies the name of the item being created. It must be a valid Sitecore item name.
template - specifies the template that the new item is based on. It either accepts the template ID or the relative template path. For example, "Sample/MyTemplate"
successListener - Success result callback.
errorListener - Error result callback
Returns:
RequestBuilder to build the request.

                          Response.Listener<ItemsResponse> successListener,

Creates RequestBuilder to build the CreateItemRequest

Parameters:
branchId - specifies the branch id that the new item is based on.
successListener - Success result callback.

validate

void validate(android.content.Context context,
              Response.Listener<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
Executes default items request (/-/item/v1/) to check result code.

Parameters:
context - current context.
callback - Is called after request is executed with true if request succeeded (200 <= code <= 300), and false otherwise.

getRenderingHtml

GetRenderingHtmlRequestBuilder getRenderingHtml(java.lang.String renderingId,
                                                java.lang.String itemId,
                                                Response.Listener<java.lang.String> successListener,
                                                Response.ErrorListener errorListener)
Creates GetRenderingHtmlRequestBuilder to build special request to load html rendering of an item.

Parameters:
renderingId - Id of needed rendering item.
itemId - Id of needed data source item.
successListener - Success result callback.
errorListener - Error result callback

uploadMedia

UploadMediaRequestOptions uploadMedia(java.lang.String itemPath,
                                      java.lang.String itemName,
                                      java.lang.String mediaFilePath)
Creates UploadMediaRequestOptions that describe image upload request. Afterwards UploadMediaService.startUpload(android.content.Context, net.sitecore.android.sdk.api.UploadMediaRequestOptions, com.android.volley.Response.Listener, com.android.volley.Response.ErrorListener) or UploadMediaService.newUploadIntent(android.content.Context, java.lang.Class, net.sitecore.android.sdk.api.UploadMediaRequestOptions, com.android.volley.Response.Listener, com.android.volley.Response.ErrorListener) must be used.

Parameters:
itemPath - Media folder path to upload media to.
itemName - Name of the media item.
mediaFilePath - any of "content://"(file name should be explicitly set), "http://", "file://"
Returns:
UploadMediaRequestOptions that describe image upload request.

getBaseUrl

java.lang.String getBaseUrl()
Returns:
Backend url with port.

isAnonymous

boolean isAnonymous()

shouldCache

boolean shouldCache()
Returns:
true if requests should cache all responses. false by default.

setShouldCache

void setShouldCache(boolean shouldCache)
Sets default caching value for all built requests. Setting this value in request have higher priority.

createEncodedName

java.lang.String createEncodedName()
Creates encoded name for auth http header. Returns null when isAnonymous() is true;

createEncodedPassword

java.lang.String createEncodedPassword()
Creates encoded password for auth http header. Returns null when isAnonymous() is true;
